name: OpenABR Project
tagline: This is the homepage for the OpenABR Project: A web-based system to aid auditory scientists with their research.
body:
### Welcome to the OpenABR Project
This page is still under construction pending a future release.

### Ryugo Lab
Your site has moved too <http://ryugolab.openabr.com>

### Github
The project is being developed and managed as a Github project shown at the top of this page in blue. This site also contains a wiki, basic help and issue/bug tracker. This is 'currently' the best way to communicate with me (@daskurka) until something more permanent is organised.

### Support / Contact / Ideas
Please use the Github project to raise an issue. Again this is a temporary page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
